
.. _lgrass:

.. module:: _lgrass

L-grass documentation
############################

Module description
==================

.. sidebar:: Summary

    :Version: |version|
    :Release: |release|
    :Date: |today|
    :Author: See `Authors`_ section
    :ChangeLog: See `ChangeLog`_ section
    
.. topic:: Overview

    L-grass, A Functional Structural Plant Model of ryegrass morphogenesis of leaf and roots, based on self regulations.

Documentation
=============

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    User Guide<user.rst>   
    Reference Guide<ref.rst>


Contact
=======

For any question, send an email to lgrass-request@groupes.renater.fr.


Versioning
==========

Sources are versioned on Git repository hosted by https://sourcesup.renater.fr.  
If you need an access to the current in development version of the model, please send 
an email to lgrass-request@groupes.renater.fr.

=======

=========

.. include:: ../CHANGES


License
=======

|lgrass| is released under CeCILL-C License. See file :download:`LICENSE <../LICENSE>` for details.
